T206 Jake Beckley Portrait, SGC30 - SOLD - Thank you! .. crease along right side, does not go through his picture, just background - otherwise a nice, clean card!  Piedmont 350 back.  $65 delivered, Paypal preferred (gift if possible), check or M.O. also OK.  

Email or PM, [url]Edwolf1963@aol.com[/url].  

Thanks for looking/considering!
